page.title: 15Parents' Jobs in Pitsea.
page.content: A group of 30 children at Pitsea Junior School wrote about what jobs their parents had. Three fathers worked in factories and three fathers worked in offices.Another three fathers were car mechanics.Two dads were builders and two dads were plumbers.Apart from these the other jobs were only occupied by one particular father.These included fireman,teacher,insurance man , carpenter ,and an artist.Most fathers had jobs. Only about half the mothers had jobs, the other half staying at home and being housewives.Three mothers had jobs in shops and two mothers were cleaners.Other jobs included hairdressing ,keep fit teaching , machinist ,office worker ,and dinner lady at a school.
